name: bionano_hybrid_2enzyme
title: Bionano Hybrid Scaffolding - Two Enzyme Workflow

inputSpec.name: bng_enzyme1
inputSpec.label: Bionano Enzyme 1 RefineFinal CMAP
inputSpec.help: The CMAP file produced by merging the CMAPs from the refineFinal step of the BioNano assembly pipeline

inputSpec.name: bng_enzyme2
inputSpec.label: Bionano Enzyme 2 RefineFinal CMAP
inputSpec.help: The CMAP file produced by merging the CMAPs from the refineFinal step of the BioNano assembly pipeline

inputSpec.name: ngs_fasta_or_cmap
inputSpec.label: FASTA or CMAP file from NGS
inputSpec.help: An assembly produced from sequencing technologies such as PacBio or Illumina

inputSpec.name: cuts1_file
inputSpec.label: Conflict Resolution File BNG1
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Input a conflict resolution file indicating which NGS and BioNano conflicting contigs to be cut (Overwrites -B and -N filter levels)

inputSpec.name: cuts2_file
inputSpec.label: Conflict Resolution File BNG2
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Input a conflict resolution file indicating which NGS and BioNano conflicting contigs to be cut (Overwrites -B and -N filter levels)

inputSpec.name: args_xml
inputSpec.label: Arguments XML file
inputSpec.help: (Optional) The arguments XML file for hybrid scaffolding. If not specified, default parameters are used.
